name: Monster Pub
description: Monster Pub is an episodic narrative game about finding new friends in a new town, but, uh, also everyone is a monster, including you! Be a good friend, or a bad friend! Play cards and crush your opponent! Or maybe just try to have a nice time, I'm not your boss.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Storage: 210 MB available space
